mapper.insert: INSERT INTO members (user_id, user_name, user_pwd, email_id, email_domain, join_date) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userName}, #{userPwd}, #{emailId}, #{emailDomain}, NOW());
mapper.update: UPDATE members SET user_name = #{userName}, user_pwd = #{userPwd}, email_id = #{emailId}, email_domain = #{emailDomain} WHERE user_id = #{userId}
